name: Coder (ThinkDownstairs)
description:
THIS IS OUR SUBMISSION FOR THE METAGAMEJAM 2018 (17. - 31. MARCH)

You’re unlucky tonight.

The binary gods of duality have chosen you to defend honor and employment of all your fellows against the 'Triple Evils' aka Stakeholders. By denying the limits of simple mortals you’re ordered to fix all insane bugs and catch a never ending army of exceptions, appearing on your screen.

Yet there’s no feeling of distress, nor anxiety. All of a sudden a flash of light breaks through a small basement window and you reach out to this shiny artifact. A thundering voice shatters through your ears:
“With the power of this dark, steaming pot of coffee your powers will exceed a mortal human.”

With tears in your eyes you start to smash the keyboard and start to become a LEGEND.


HowTo:
Use your mouse to move the editor and the try-except-block.
Left click to shoot a code snippet and you earn points when you hit a bug or lose point when you miss.
You will Level-Up by earning points.
Missing exceptions will drain your coffee pots.
With every Level-Up you refill your coffee.
